alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 11:11PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Buchanan, northwestern McDowell, southeastern Mingo, Wyoming, southeastern Logan and south central Boone Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1107 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms from Hinch northeast to Mallory, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pineville, Oceana, Hanover, R.d. Bailey Lake, Mallory, Amherstdale-Robinette, Gilbert Creek, Gilbert, Davy, Bradshaw, Iaeger, Clear Fork, Panther, Cyclone, Coal Mountain, Bruno, Kopperston, Amherstdale-Robine, Avondale and Wolf Pen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for southwestern Virginia...and central and southern West Virginia.
